lines.text: I'm not going to talk to you! You're a stranger!
What's it like to be a stranger?
Hmmph! I've got better Pokémon in my closet! I've even got a Moltres!
So what if my Moltres is a toy one? You haven't got any Moltres!
Are you here to catch some Pokémon? Are they scary ones?
I bet I could catch a scary Pokémon if I had Mega Super Magic Poké Ball!
Are you scared of Pokémon? I'm not scared at all! Well, not much...
Some Pokémon are a BIT scary. I only like the fluffy ones.
